QuestData.Title: Glimmerfin Scale
QuestData.Description:
<A brightly-colored scale fell to the ground as the murloc ran off. It was unlike any other murloc you've seen in Northrend.
Perhaps King Mrgl-Mrgl would know more about this new species?>
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the scale to King Mrgl-Mrgl in Borean Tundra.
